items.title: How Your Loneliness May  May Be Harming Your Whole Company
items.description: Managerial roles set people apart from their subordinates, but our always-on office culture may make leaders even more isolated.

items.title: The Big Fail: Most Bomb This Post-Pandemic Work Etiquette Quiz
items.description: A recent quiz in on how to handle various office scenarios got results that would alarm Emily Post.

items.title: How to Help Your Company’s AI Training Keep Pace With Your Employees’ Use of It
items.description: New data show exactly how enthusiastic people are about using AI at work, even if it’s in a risky way.

items.title: Trump’s Truth Social Just Inked a $6 Billion Merger in Perhaps the Most Bizarre M&A Deal of 2025
items.description: President Trump’s social media platform plans to merge with a nearly 30-year-old energy company, providing it with some $300 million in funding.

items.title: Melinda French Gates Makes Big Prediction About 2026
items.description: It’s been a focus of her own philanthropy.
